product_info.title: ZT600 RFID INDUSTRIAL PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZT600 RFID INDUSTRIAL PRINTERS
ZT600 RFID Industrial Printers
Strong, smart and scalable RFID encoding
To stay ahead in today’s highly competitive manufacturing or transportation and logistics industries, you need technology solutions
that will grow with your business. ZT600 Series printers combine industrial durability and user-friendly features with future-proof
adaptability–including a factory–or field-installable RFID encoder–to meet your evolving needs for years to come. Featuring Zebra
DNA™ for Printers, a suite of applications, utilities and developer tools–all powered by Link-OS™–these RFID printers are easy to
integrate, manage and maintain from any location around the globe. Optimized to accurately and efficiently print and encode labels
and tags, the ZT600 Series RFID printers give greater control, and insight, which can lead to significant advantages in a highly
competitive environment.
Adaptive encoding enables media flexibility and simple RFID
calibration, eliminating complex placement guides. An
intuitive menu further reduces setup time. And Zebra’s RFID
technology is certified on six continents, providing operational
visibility and business insight across complex, multinational
supply chains.
Get 24/7 reliability, even in the harshest environments
Built to deliver outstanding print quality under the most
challenging industrial conditions, ZT600 Series printers
virtually eliminate operational downtime due to printer failure.
Their durable, all-metal designs hold up against extreme
temperatures, dust, debris, moisture and worse. Guided
instructions and feedback eliminate common errors and
Get unparalleled visibility and control with Link-OS reduce manual adjustments for highly consistent printing. And
high-quality print mechanisms and internal components
At Zebra, we believe printers should be as intuitive,
deliver superior print quality and speed across the widest
user-friendly and integrated as the smartphones and other
range of applications. A field-installable, full-width,
devices that keep us connected outside of work. With intuitive
guillotine-style cutter with catch tray is ideal for apparel tag

accommodate. By spacing inlays closer, label converters use

The industrial brawn and next-gen brains to meet every challenge head-on.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zt600r
--- Page 2 ---
Customize your configuration with flexible connectivity
System setup, integration and updates are a snap with
virtually every modern connectivity option. Standard
connectivity includes serial, USB, Ethernet, USB host and
Bluetooth® with optional parallel, 802.11ax, 802.11ac,
applicator port, IPv6 and BTLE capabilities. You also get two
open media slots for non-standard connectivity options,
design failover connections and provisioning for future
protocols
Increase your efficiency with a user-friendly design
Every detail of the ZT600 Series was designed to put time back
in your day. Immediately see status at a glance on the 4.3 in.
full-color touch display. You can also quickly navigate printer
settings with the user friendly icon menu system to change
languages, printer settings, connectivity options and
more–right from the display. Color-illuminated media and
ribbon paths streamline routine maintenance. Adjustable
media width and pressure toggles easily accommodate more
applications. And onboard sensors, diagnostics and help
resources empower you to manage issues without having to
call in support.
--- Page 3 ---
Specifications
RFID Operating Characteristics
• Supports tags compatible with: UHF EPC Gen 2 V2.1, ISO/IEC Operating Thermal transfer: 40 °F to 104 °F/5 °C to 40 °C
18000-63 and RAIN RFID protocols Temperatures Direct thermal: 32 °F to 104 °F/0 °C to 40 °C
• Integrated RFID system is user-upgradeable in the field and
available on both 4 in. and 6 in. models Operating 20% to 85% non-condensing
• Adaptive Encoding Technology automatically selects optimum Humidity
encode settings
• Supports industry standard, multi-vendor, chip-based
serialization Storage/Transp -22 °F to 140 °F/-30 °C to 60 °C
• Supports block permalocking of user memory compatible with ortation
ATA Spec 2000 Temperature
• Allows users to track performance with RFID job-monitoring
tools Storage 20% to 85% non-condensing
Humidity
Electrical Auto-detectable (PFC Compliant) 90-265 VAC,
Standard Features 47-63Hz, rated at 250 Watts
ENERGY STAR qualified
• Print Methods: Thermal transfer and direct thermal printing Agency IEC 60950, EN 55022 Class B, EN 55024, EN
• Construction: Metal frame and bi-fold metal media cover with Approvals 61000-3-2, EN 61000-3-3
enlarged clear viewing window cTUVus, CE Marking, FCC-B, ICES-003, VCCI,
• Side-loading supplies path for simplified media and ribbon C-Tick, NOM, S-Mark (Arg), CCC, CU, BSMI,
loading KCC, SABS, IN-Metro
• Thin film printhead with E3™ Element Energy™ Equalizer for
superior print quality
• Communications: USB 2.0, RS-232 Serial, Gigabit Ethernet,
Bluetooth 4.0 Zebra DNA™ for Printers
• 4.3 in. color touch display with intuitive menu for quick
operation and settings management
Zebra DNA is a suite of software tools that enable Zebra printers
to deliver a full lifecycle of exceptional experiences for every kind
of user through built-in applications, utilities and tools to get your
printer up and running quickly and securely. For more
Physical Characteristics information, please visit
www.zebra.com/zebradna
